caption.center: JOHN BOLAND JEREMIAH GIBBS, Respondent, v. AARON KREIZEL and Another,
Composing the Firm of A. KREIZEL SON, Appellants.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Order affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements. No opinion.
